title: JNTUA College of Engineering: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: JNTUA College of Engineering Admission 2024 is open for various courses. JNTUA College of Engineering Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on JNTUA College of Engineering Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

The institute has a training and placement cell that helps students transition from an academic environment to a professional one. The committee works towards grooming students and their personalities and improving their skillset to give them an edge over their competition. The highest package was INR 4 LPA for the academic year 2018-19. The institute has shown a remarkable placement record with the following reputed companies: TCS, INFOSYS, Wipro, CTS, Harman, Mind Tree, Syntel, CGI, Cap Gemini, Tech Mahindra and many more.

basic_info.name: JNTUA College of Engineering Scholarship
description: The college does not have scholarship programs of its own yet, but students can apply for state government or central government scholarship programs. Most of the scholarships are merit-based.
Students can avail of different state government scholarship programs according to their requirements and apply through the online portal on the official website of the college.

faqs.question: When do I apply?
faqs.answer: Ans.Students can apply to the college after the cut-off list has been uploaded on the college website. The list is mostly announced within a week or two of the release of the EAMCET and ECET.

faqs.question: How do I apply?
faqs.answer: Ans.Students have to apply through the website and are present at the time of counseling for the allocation of seats and document verification.

faqs.question: Does the college have hostel accommodation?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the college has separate hostels for girls and boys. There are 2 hostels for girls and two for boys. They are well equipped with facilities like Safe drinking water through R.O System, Water coolers, Dispensary, Reading Room: News Papers (English & Telugu), and T.V Room. The hostels can accommodate 560 boys and 475 girls each.

faqs.question: What are the hostel fees?
faqs.answer: Ans.The hostel fee structure is as follows:Hostel Caution DepositINR 1,500Admission feeINR 1,000Miscellaneous feeINR 1,500Room rent (per year)INR 600TotalINR 4,600

faqs.question: What is the qualification required for the 1ST Year B.Tech admission?
faqs.answer: Ans.Candidate must have passed in the EAMCET examination to be eligible for admission to 1st year B.Tech. degree course. The cut-off for the same shall be displayed on the website.

Section.name: About JNTUA CEK
Section.description:
JNTUA College of Engineering, established in 2013, is recognized by AICTE. It is a constituent college of Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Anantapur (JNTUA). The institute offers six undergraduate B.Tech. courses which are Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science, Civil Engineering, Food Technology, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, and Electronics & Communication Engineering. The admission to all these courses is through the EAMCET exam for the 1st year and the ECET exam for the 2nd year. The institute is well equipped with facilities to cater the needs of faculties students as well as faculties.
The institute currently offers only an undergraduate course in B.Tech with a duration of 4 years. The intake capacity of each course is 60 seats. Following are the specializations offered for the course:
Know more JNTUA College of Engineering Courses

JNTUA College of Engineering Placement
The institute has a training and placement cell that helps students transition from an academic environment to a professional one. The committee works towards grooming students and their personalities and improving their skillset to give them an edge over their competition. The highest package was INR 4 LPA for the academic year 2018-19. The institute has shown a remarkable placement record with the following reputed companies: TCS, INFOSYS, Wipro, CTS, Harman, Mind Tree, Syntel, CGI, Cap Gemini, Tech Mahindra and many more.
Click here JNTUA College of Engineering Placement
The college does not have scholarship programs of its own yet, but students can apply for state government or central government scholarship programs. Most of the scholarships are merit-based.
Students can avail of different state government scholarship programs according to their requirements and apply through the online portal on the official website of the college.
Read more JNTUA College of Engineering Scholarship
The college is well equipped with various facilities like:
The institute has appointed teachers with the goal that they impart the best quality education to its students. The teaching staff has 61 teachers in total from all departments of which 17 have completed their Ph.D. in their respective fields of study.
Check JNTUA College of Engineering Faculty
Ques. When do I apply?
Ans. Students can apply to the college after the cut-off list has been uploaded on the college website. The list is mostly announced within a week or two of the release of the EAMCET and ECET.
Ques. How do I apply?
Ans. Students have to apply through the website and are present at the time of counseling for the allocation of seats and document verification.
Ques. Does the college have hostel accommodation?
Ans. Yes, the college has separate hostels for girls and boys. There are 2 hostels for girls and two for boys. They are well equipped with facilities like Safe drinking water through R.O System, Water coolers, Dispensary, Reading Room: News Papers (English & Telugu), and T.V Room. The hostels can accommodate 560 boys and 475 girls each.
Ques. What are the hostel fees?
Ans. The hostel fee structure is as follows:
Hostel Caution Deposit
INR 1,500
Admission fee
INR 1,000
Miscellaneous fee
INR 1,500
Room rent (per year)
INR 600
Total
INR 4,600
Ques. What is the qualification required for the 1ST Year B.Tech admission?
Ans. Candidate must have passed in the EAMCET examination to be eligible for admission to 1st year B.Tech. degree course. The cut-off for the same shall be displayed on the website.
